summary: HACCP PDF Report feature testing completed successfully. All 4 PDF generation endpoints working correctly. Frontend UI with 'Stampa Report PDF per Ispezioni ASL' section fully functional. All download buttons working.
context_for_next_testing_agent: HACCP PDF Report feature fully tested. Endpoints: /api/haccp-report/completo-pdf, /api/haccp-report/temperature-pdf (tipo=frigoriferi|congelatori), /api/haccp-report/sanificazioni-pdf. All require mese=YYYY-MM parameter. Frontend has data-testid attributes for all buttons.

features_tested.GET /api/haccp-report/completo-pdf?mese=: ✅ Working - Returns PDF with complete HACCP report
features_tested.GET /api/haccp-report/temperature-pdf?me: ✅ Working - Returns PDF with frigoriferi temperatures
✅ Working - Returns PDF with congelatori temperatures
features_tested.GET /api/haccp-report/sanificazioni-pdf?: ✅ Working - Returns PDF with sanificazioni records
features_tested.UI HACCP Dashboard PDF section: ✅ Working - All 4 download buttons visible and functional
features_tested.PDF Download buttons: ✅ Working - All downloads trigger correctly with proper filenames
